mapper.select: SELECT N.EY_ACCOUNT_NUM as accountNum, N.AMOUNT_CURRENT as amountCurrent, N.AMOUNT_ADJ_CR as crAmountAdj, N.AMOUNT_ADJ_DR as drAmountAdj, N.AMOUNT_AUDIT_LAST as amountAuditLast FROM wp_n N where 1 = 1 and N.STATUS = 'Y' and N.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and N.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT N300.ATTR1 as detailName, N300.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY as beginBalance, N300.DR_AMOUNT_CNY as drAmount, N300.CR_AMOUNT_CNY as crAmount FROM wp_n300 N300 where 1 = 1 and N300.STATUS = 'Y' and N300.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and N300.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT N400.EY_ACCOUNT_NUM as accountNum, N400.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY as beginBalance, N400.DR_AMOUNT_CNY as drAmount, N400.CR_AMOUNT_CNY as crAmount FROM wp_n400 N400 where 1 = 1 and N400.STATUS = 'Y' and N400.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and N400.PERIOD = #{period}
select W.LEVEL as SaleFeeTitle FROM ds_tmpl_n400 W where 1 = 1 AND W.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND W.PERIOD = #{period} AND W.TYPE = '销售服务费' GROUP BY W.FUND_CODE,W.LEVEL,W.TYPE ORDER BY W.LEVEL

SELECT W.TRX_DATE as TrxDate, W.NET_VALUE NetValue, MAX(CASE WHEN IFNULL(W.LEVEL,'') = IFNULL((select DT400.LEVEL as SaleFeeTiltle from ds_tmpl_n400 DT400 where DT400.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND DT400.PERIOD = #{period} AND DT400.TYPE = '销售服务费' GROUP BY DT400.FUND_CODE,DT400.LEVEL,DT400.TYPE ORDER BY DT400.LEVEL limit 0,1),'') then W.LEVEL_NET_VALUE else 0 end) as NetValue1, MAX(CASE WHEN IFNULL(W.LEVEL,'') = IFNULL((select DT400.LEVEL as SaleFeeTiltle from ds_tmpl_n400 DT400 where DT400.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND DT400.PERIOD = #{period} AND DT400.TYPE = '销售服务费' GROUP BY DT400.FUND_CODE,DT400.LEVEL,DT400.TYPE ORDER BY DT400.LEVEL limit 1,1),'') then W.LEVEL_NET_VALUE else 0 end) as NetValue2, MAX(CASE WHEN IFNULL(W.LEVEL,'') = IFNULL((select DT400.LEVEL as SaleFeeTiltle from ds_tmpl_n400 DT400 where DT400.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND DT400.PERIOD = #{period} AND DT400.TYPE = '销售服务费' GROUP BY DT400.FUND_CODE,DT400.LEVEL,DT400.TYPE ORDER BY DT400.LEVEL limit 2,1),'') then W.LEVEL_NET_VALUE else 0 end) as NetValue3, MAX(CASE WHEN IFNULL(W.LEVEL,'') = IFNULL((select DT400.LEVEL as SaleFeeTiltle from ds_tmpl_n400 DT400 where DT400.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND DT400.PERIOD = #{period} AND DT400.TYPE = '销售服务费' GROUP BY DT400.FUND_CODE,DT400.LEVEL,DT400.TYPE ORDER BY DT400.LEVEL limit 3,1),'') then W.LEVEL_NET_VALUE else 0 end) as NetValue4, MAX(CASE WHEN IFNULL(W.LEVEL,'') = IFNULL((select DT400.LEVEL as SaleFeeTiltle from ds_tmpl_n400 DT400 where DT400.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND DT400.PERIOD = #{period} AND DT400.TYPE = '销售服务费' GROUP BY DT400.FUND_CODE,DT400.LEVEL,DT400.TYPE ORDER BY DT400.LEVEL limit 4,1),'') then W.LEVEL_NET_VALUE else 0 end) as NetValue5, SUM(CASE WHEN W.TYPE='销售服务费'and IFNULL(w.LEVEL,'') = IFNULL((select DT400.LEVEL as SaleFeeTiltle from ds_tmpl_n400 DT400 where DT400.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND DT400.PERIOD = #{period} AND DT400.TYPE = '销售服务费' GROUP BY DT400.FUND_CODE,DT400.LEVEL,DT400.TYPE ORDER BY DT400.LEVEL limit 0,1),'') then IFNULL(rate,0) else 0 end) as SalesFeeRate1, SUM(CASE WHEN W.TYPE='销售服务费'and IFNULL(w.LEVEL,'') = IFNULL((select DT400.LEVEL as SaleFeeTiltle from ds_tmpl_n400 DT400 where DT400.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND DT400.PERIOD = #{period} AND DT400.TYPE = '销售服务费' GROUP BY DT400.FUND_CODE,DT400.LEVEL,DT400.TYPE ORDER BY DT400.LEVEL limit 1,1),'') then IFNULL(rate,0) else 0 end) as SalesFeeRate2, SUM(CASE WHEN W.TYPE='销售服务费'and IFNULL(w.LEVEL,'') = IFNULL((select DT400.LEVEL as SaleFeeTiltle from ds_tmpl_n400 DT400 where DT400.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND DT400.PERIOD = #{period} AND DT400.TYPE = '销售服务费' GROUP BY DT400.FUND_CODE,DT400.LEVEL,DT400.TYPE ORDER BY DT400.LEVEL limit 2,1),'') then IFNULL(rate,0) else 0 end) as SalesFeeRate3, SUM(CASE WHEN W.TYPE='销售服务费'and IFNULL(w.LEVEL,'') = IFNULL((select DT400.LEVEL as SaleFeeTiltle from ds_tmpl_n400 DT400 where DT400.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND DT400.PERIOD = #{period} AND DT400.TYPE = '销售服务费' GROUP BY DT400.FUND_CODE,DT400.LEVEL,DT400.TYPE ORDER BY DT400.LEVEL limit 3,1),'') then IFNULL(rate,0) else 0 end) as SalesFeeRate4, SUM(CASE WHEN W.TYPE='销售服务费'and IFNULL(w.LEVEL,'') = IFNULL((select DT400.LEVEL as SaleFeeTiltle from ds_tmpl_n400 DT400 where DT400.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND DT400.PERIOD = #{period} AND DT400.TYPE = '销售服务费' GROUP BY DT400.FUND_CODE,DT400.LEVEL,DT400.TYPE ORDER BY DT400.LEVEL limit 0,1),'') then IFNULL(rate,0) else 0 end) as SalesFeeRate5, SUM(CASE WHEN W.TYPE='管理费' then IFNULL(rate,0) else 0 end) as ManagementFeeRate, SUM(CASE WHEN W.TYPE='托管费' then IFNULL(rate,0) else 0 end) as CustodyFeeRate FROM wp_n400_rate W where W.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND W.PERIOD = #{period} group by W.FUND_ID,W.PERIOD,w.TRX_DATE ORDER BY W.TRX_DATE

SELECT N600.ATTR1 as `name`, N600.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY as beginBalance, N600.END_BALANCE_CNY as endBalance FROM wp_n600 N600 where 1 = 1 and N600.STATUS = 'Y' and N600.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and N600.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT CONCAT(N800.ATTR1,N800.ATTR4,N800.ATTR3) as detailName, N800.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY as beginBalance, N800.DR_AMOUNT_CNY as drAmount, N800.CR_AMOUNT_CNY as crAmount FROM wp_n800 N800 where 1 = 1 and N800.STATUS = 'Y' and N800.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and N800.PERIOD = #{period}
SELECT DISTINCT IFNULL(sfi.MF, 'N') as MFFlag FROM sys_fund_info sfi WHERE sfi.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND sfi.ACTIVE = 'Y'
SELECT DISTINCT IFNULL(N800N.`LEVEL`,'发生额') as levels FROM wp_n800_note N800N where 1 = 1 and N800N.STATUS = 'Y' and N800N.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and N800N.PERIOD = #{period} ORDER BY N800N.LEVEL

SELECT IFNULL(N800N.`LEVEL`,'发生额') as `level`, IFNULL(N800N.ITEM1,0) as item1, IFNULL(N800N.ITEM2,0) as item2, IFNULL(N800N.ITEM3,0) as item3, IFNULL(N800N.ITEM4,0) as item4, IFNULL(N800N.ITEM5,0) as item5, IFNULL(N800N.ITEM6,0) as item6 FROM wp_n800_note N800N where 1 = 1 and N800N.STATUS = 'Y' and N800N.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and N800N.PERIOD = #{period} ORDER BY N800N.LEVEL

SELECT N800D.`LEVEL` as `level`, IF(N800D.ITEM1 = 0, null, N800D.ITEM1) as item1, IF(N800D.ITEM2 = 0, null, N800D.ITEM2) as item2, IF(N800D.ITEM3 = 0, null, N800D.ITEM3) as item3, IF(N800D.ITEM4 = 0, null, N800D.ITEM4) as item4 FROM wp_n800_dis N800D where 1 = 1 and N800D.STATUS = 'Y' and N800D.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and N800D.PERIOD = #{period} ORDER BY N800D.LEVEL

SELECT N10000.ITEM as item, IF(N10000.BEGIN_BALANCE = 0, null, N10000.BEGIN_BALANCE) as beginBalance, IF(N10000.END_BALANCE = 0, null, N10000.END_BALANCE) as endBalance FROM wp_n10000 AS N10000 where 1 = 1 and N10000.STATUS = 'Y' and N10000.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and N10000.PERIOD = #{period} ORDER BY N10000.SORT

SELECT IF(SUM(N10000.BEGIN_BALANCE) = 0, null, SUM(N10000.BEGIN_BALANCE)) as beginBalance, IF(SUM(N10000.END_BALANCE) = 0, null, SUM(N10000.END_BALANCE)) as endBalance FROM wp_n10000 AS N10000 where 1 = 1 and N10000.STATUS = 'Y' and N10000.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and N10000.PERIOD = #{period} LIMIT 1

SELECT SUM(IFNULL(N10000.END_BALANCE, 0)) + SUM(IFNULL(N10000.BEGIN_BALANCE, 0)) FROM wp_n10000 AS N10000 where 1 = 1 and N10000.STATUS = 'Y' and N10000.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and N10000.PERIOD = #{period}
